page.title: 02Fire Service
page.content: A modern two bay fire station on Maer Lane serves the area and gives assistance to neighbouring counties as well.The two appliances are manned by twenty part time crew controlled by a full time station officer who is responsible for three other stations. The men are called out in cases of emergency by means of a radio alerter system,each man carrying a pocket receiver.The fire station has manually operated up and over doors leading to the two bays.A range of heated lockers are provided and a drying room is also available.The adjacent drill yard has a tank for testing pumps and training operators.There is a 50 foot drill tower.
